resources.string: I am a Splash screen, look at me load!

Hey, you! Changing your username is a big deal! Changing it will generate an entirely new identity, which means none of your previous Shouts wil be linked to this new username.\n\nRemember, once you change your username, there is no going back.
Unable to save your shout. Please try again.
Unable to send your shout. Please reshout later.

As part of research into censorship-resistant communication, all Shouts sent over MANES are recorded and associated with the sender\'s Shout username and location. No Shout data is directly associated with MANES data. The data collection is only a temporary measure; once Shout is based on a true ad hoc network (rather than MANES), absolutely no data will be logged. We hope to reach this point as soon as possible, which is why we are requesting to store the data.\n\n If you do not agree to these terms, please uninstall Shout. For more information, click here.
